main event: A cigar-shaped object was observed over Red Bluff, California for approximately 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as silver colored and measured 3 feet by 1 foot., It made no sound and had no discernible details., The sighting was made by a teacher along with two other teachers and 25 school children., The location had clear visibility with no clouds present., After investigation, civil defense authorities found no evidence of the object.
witness description: a teacher and two other teachers along with school children
